name: Rotating-screens
body:
### Welcome to Rotating-screens
This page will give you a short demo and explanation of what this project aims to do. Any feedbacks would be greatly appreciated!

Please follow https://github.com/dandb/rotating-screens to go to the actual repository

## Demo
Launch your local project and login with your default credentials (admin@admin.com/password)

![demo_image1](http://i.imgur.com/fbOmN8G.png)

Create your users as needed. Two different account types are available: Admin and user. An admin can create/edit new and current users. Admin is also allowed to edit any offices' dashboards while a user can only edit their office's dashboard and display it.

![demo_image2](http://i.imgur.com/fb9gvlt.png)

# Admin Dashboard
Currently _Dun & Bradstreet Credibility Corp_ has six offices but you may change your office locations as you desire.
![demo_image3](http://i.imgur.com/D9VRxJJ.png)

# User Dashboard
Click "Start Dashboard" to display your dashboard!
![demo_image3](http://i.imgur.com/qYEqiKB.png)

Each url comes with a cover page using its description as its title.
![demo_image4](http://i.imgur.com/Phytacy.png)
![demo_image5](http://i.imgur.com/rMoNjgT.png)

This project aims to increase the productivity of your office. You may and should change anything to fit your office's needs!
Rotating-screens is in a constant development, feel free to give us any inputs and feedbacks, we greatly appreciate them.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
